name: I'm Dreaming of a Black and White Christmas
overview: I'm Dreaming of a Black and White Christmas is a simple puzzle game for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum. Despite it's name, it is NOT an actual Christmas game. It was developed by Bob Fossil and published within e-magazine "WOOT! Tape Magazine issue #1 - ZXMAS 2017 Edition". It is a demake of the Nintendo DS game, Polarium.
